renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTokenPriceFeed(address,address,uint25.details: to set or change priceFeed contract for token

params._mcr: minimal collateral ratio of the token
params._mlr: minimal liquidation ratio of the token
params._priceFeed: address of the PriceFeed contract for token

transferOwnership(address).details: transfers user's trove ownership after revoking other roles from other addresses

params._newOwner: the address of the new owner
